title: Roof Hacks: A Leafblower vs. Sheets of Ice
description: Tasked with having to clear ice off of a rubber roof, Redditor amish_novelty reached for a leafblower:Reddit being Reddit, one of the commenters channeled his inner Christopher Nolan and ran the video backwards:We think amish_novelty needs to join forces with the last Redditor we saw hacking a leafblower.
author: Rain Noe

html:
Roof Hacks: A Leafblower vs. Sheets of Ice

Oddly Satisfying indeed

Tasked with having to clear ice off of a rubber roof, Redditor amish_novelty reached for a leafblower:

Reddit being Reddit, one of the commenters channeled his inner Christopher Nolan and ran the video backwards:

We think amish_novelty needs to join forces with the last Redditor we saw hacking a leafblower.

  • Favorite This

  • Comment

Comments

  • 8 hours ago

    Wonderful, more leaf blower noise. And from high up on a roof so even more people get to hear it. Can't they just rake the ice off the roof ;)
